translation.vi: Be advised, subject is turning eastonto Broadway.

translation.en: It hasn't happened yet, and I know who has her.
translation.vi: It hasn't happened yet,and I know who has her.

translation.en: There's a reason that they brought you here.
translation.vi: There's a reasonthat they brought you here.

translation.en: they're going to put a bullet in your brain.
translation.vi: they're going to put a bulletin your brain.

translation.en: She is, you are, we all are. Let's try to keep it that way.
translation.vi: She is, you are, we all are.Let's try to keep it that way.

translation.en: Every telephone grid, shortwave, cell tower.
translation.vi: Every telephone grid,shortwave, cell tower.

translation.en: [operator] Your call cannot be completed as dialed.
translation.vi: [operator]Your call cannot be completed as dialed.

translation.en: -[mouths] Fuck. -[beeping]
translation.vi: -[mouths] Fuck.-[beeping]

translation.en: [operator] Your call cannot be completed as dialed.
translation.vi: [operator]Your call cannot be completed as dialed.

translation.en: -[whirring] -FBI! Down on your knees!
translation.vi: -[whirring]-FBI! Down on your knees!

translation.en: [Callie] You okay? That looked pretty close.
translation.vi: [Callie] You okay?That looked pretty close.

translation.en: -You didn't get him. -Not alive. He fired on the chopper.
translation.vi: -You didn't get him.-Not alive. He fired on the chopper.

translation.en: But it doesn't matter. He couldn't call in the hit.
translation.vi: But it doesn't matter.He couldn't call in the hit.

translation.en: So as far as they're concerned, you're not here yet.
translation.vi: So as far as they're concerned,you're not here yet.

translation.en: Every way I try this, she still ends up dead.
translation.vi: Every way I try this,she still ends up dead.

translation.en: They have to bring her here in a vehicle, right?
translation.vi: They have to bring her herein a vehicle, right?

translation.en: -Looking for a license plate. -Right.
translation.vi: -Looking for a license plate.-Right.

translation.en: California tag, five, zero, kilo, foxtrot, two, seven, two.
translation.vi: California tag, five, zero,kilo, foxtrot, two, seven, two.

translation.en: -Please, where are you taking me? -[speaking in German]
translation.vi: -Please, where are you taking me?-[speaking in German]

translation.en: and the regional team just showed to back us up.
translation.vi: and the regional team just showedto back us up.

translation.en: A van carrying Elizabeth Cooper will exit the warehouse
translation.vi: A van carrying Elizabeth Cooperwill exit the warehouse

translation.en: across from Pier 18 compound in approximately five minutes.
translation.vi: across from Pier 18 compoundin approximately five minutes.

translation.en: -Do you mind? -Not anymore. Go ahead.
translation.vi: -Do you mind?-Not anymore. Go ahead.

translation.en: They've got her wrapped in explosives, wired to a cell phone.
translation.vi: They've got her wrapped in explosives,wired to a cell phone.

translation.en: Remote trigger. Another cell phone sets it off.
translation.vi: Remote trigger.Another cell phone sets it off.

translation.en: They'll take this route to the entrance gate.
translation.vi: They'll take this routeto the entrance gate.

translation.en: At that point, Alpha and Bravo will swarm the entrance--
translation.vi: At that point, Alpha and Bravowill swarm the entrance--

translation.en: If you could just be quiet and do exactly what I say,
translation.vi: If you could just be quietand do exactly what I say,

translation.en: We need to stop the vehicle here before they get through the gates.
translation.vi: We need to stop the vehicle herebefore they get through the gates.

translation.en: Alpha and Bravo will hold and contain here.
translation.vi: Alpha and Bravo will holdand contain here.

translation.en: Sniper teams will initiate on Johnson's call.
translation.vi: Sniper teams will initiateon Johnson's call.

translation.en: -All elements shoot to kill any hostiles. -What about intel?
translation.vi: -All elements shoot to kill any hostiles.-What about intel?

translation.en: -Go! Let's go! Move! -[gunfire]
translation.vi: -Go! Let's go! Move!-[gunfire]

translation.en: -Back up! -[sirens blaring]
translation.vi: -Back up!-[sirens blaring]

translation.en: -[agent] Stop the van. -Not yet. You'll kill her.
translation.vi: -[agent] Stop the van.-Not yet. You'll kill her.

translation.en: -Now. -[gunfire]
translation.vi: -Now.-[gunfire]

translation.en: [pilot] This is Charlie One on approach, east side of building.
translation.vi: [pilot] This is Charlie One on approach,east side of building.

translation.en: -[groans] -[Liz grunts]
translation.vi: -[groans]-[Liz grunts]

translation.en: This is Alpha Unit, Alpha-U! We're taking fire!
translation.vi: This is Alpha Unit, Alpha-U!We're taking fire!

translation.en: Take out the guy on the crane, northeast corner.
translation.vi: Take out the guy on the crane,northeast corner.

translation.en: -Negative on a visual. -Give me that.
translation.vi: -Negative on a visual.-Give me that.

translation.en: [Cris] Aim for the doorway, eight inches above the guardrail.
translation.vi: [Cris] Aim for the doorway,eight inches above the guardrail.

translation.en: -[speaks in German] -[gun cocks]
translation.vi: -[speaks in German]-[gun cocks]

translation.vi: [JTTF sniper]Zed David, Charlie One at entry point.

translation.en: -[gunfire] -[Liz groaning]
translation.vi: -[gunfire]-[Liz groaning]

translation.vi: -No!-[groaning]

translation.vi: [sniper] This is Charlie One element,moving and clearing, over.

translation.en: -[gunfire] -[grunts]
translation.vi: -[gunfire]-[grunts]

translation.en: There are explosives there, there and there.
translation.vi: There are explosives there,there and there.

translation.en: -[gunshot] -[grunts]
translation.vi: -[gunshot]-[grunts]

translation.en: -Sniper. -Where?
translation.vi: -Sniper.-Where?

translation.en: -Behind us. -Sniper, six o'clock.
translation.vi: -Behind us.-Sniper, six o'clock.

translation.en: -Got a visual? -Nobody move!
translation.vi: -Got a visual?-Nobody move!

translation.en: -Got him. -[gunfire]
translation.vi: -Got him.-[gunfire]

translation.en: -We'll have to clear this deck by deck. -You take this one. I'll do the rest.
translation.vi: -We'll have to clear this deck by deck.-You take this one. I'll do the rest.

translation.en: Release the hostage. You can still get out of this.
translation.vi: Release the hostage.You can still get out of this.

translation.en: -How good are you with that gun? -Very.
translation.vi: -How good are you with that gun?-Very.

translation.en: -Back off! -[panting]
translation.vi: -Back off!-[panting]

translation.en: One more step, fortune teller, and it definitely won't be good for you.
translation.vi: One more step, fortune teller,and it definitely won't be good for you.

translation.en: -That wasn't it. -[grunts]
translation.vi: -That wasn't it.-[grunts]

translation.en: -[panting] -[Cris] Liz, look at me.
translation.vi: -[panting]-[Cris] Liz, look at me.

translation.en: The nuclear device was moved. We need to find its exact location.
translation.vi: The nuclear device was moved.We need to find its exact location.

translation.en: Now, this registers any significant detonation in the Earth's crust.
translation.vi: Now, this registers any significantdetonation in the Earth's crust.

translation.en: -What? -I made a mistake.
translation.vi: -What?-I made a mistake.

translation.en: -It's happening. -When?
translation.vi: -It's happening.-When?

translation.en: -[beeping] -[explosion]
translation.vi: -[beeping]-[explosion]

translation.en: I got four teams in place. We're just waiting on the road crew.
translation.vi: I got four teams in place.We're just waiting on the road crew.

translation.en: -All right. -[phone ringing]
translation.vi: -All right.-[phone ringing]

translation.en: -Ferris. -It's me.
translation.vi: -Ferris.-It's me.

translation.en: -Liz? -[moans]
translation.vi: -Liz?-[moans]

translation.en: There's something I have to do. I can't put it off any longer.
translation.vi: There's something I have to do.I can't put it off any longer.

translation.en: Every time you look at it, it changes because you looked at it.
translation.vi: Every time you look at it,it changes because you looked at it.
